snippet: The president ordered the arrest of a high-ranking army commander over suspected violations of human rights, a military spokesman said Tuesday.
abstract: South Sudan's president orders arrest of high-ranking army commander Brig Gen James Otong over suspected violations of human rights.
lead_paragraph: The president ordered the arrest of a high-ranking army commander over suspected violations of human rights, a military spokesman said Tuesday.

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
